headline: A Hat Tip To Charlize Theron: 7 Bowlers She's Inspired Us To Wear (PHOTOS)
short descr: That all changed last week when I saw Charlize Theron out and about with her baby boy and newly-sheared crop, topped with
image_caption(s): Catarzi Exclusive For Asos Lady Bowler Hat, $15.47
article: I have a confession to make: I don't like hats. Actually, let me rephrase: I like hats on other people, but I don't wear them myself. I have a short pixie 'do, and I have never liked the way hats look on ladies with short hair. That all changed last week when I saw Charlize Theron out and about with her baby boy and newly-sheared crop, topped with a bowler hat. The hats, also known as "derby" hats, are known for their round crowns and are most recognized from films like "The Thomas Crown Affair" where artist René Magritte's iconic work "The Son Of Man" is referenced in one famous scene. Additionally, one of my stylish coworkers has a hairstyle similar to mine, and she looks adorable with her bowler hat perched just so (think Madonna in "Open Your Heart"). With that said, I am inspired to try the topper. Here, seven chic bowler hats that are miles away from "A Clockwork Orange."For more summer trends, click here.Want more? Be sure to check out Stylelist on Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr and Pinterest.

headline: Comic Con 2012 Costumes: The Wackiest Looks Spotted In San Diego
short descr: Fashion fans and comic book enthusiasts are not the most obvious of pairings, but we can't help but get excited when Comic
image_caption(s): Saban's Power Rangers POWER Up San Diego Comic-Con - Day 1
article: Fashion fans and comic book enthusiasts are not the most obvious of pairings, but we can't help but get excited when Comic Con rolls around. The excitement and energy are not unlike our own annual shows. And just like in the style world, the best part of the whole thing (to us, at least) is the clothing.Comic Con San Diego has been four days of nonstop panels, seminars and parades of seriously devoted fans. From head-to-toe body paint to neon wigs to capes as far as the eye can see, we've definitely been inspired by the imaginations of convention-goers. Even Adrianne Curry, winner of the first season of "America's Top Model," got in on the fun in multiple full-on costumes.As the convention comes to a close today, we take a look at some of the wackiest costumes at Comic Con San Diego. Would you be brave enough to wear any of these? Want more? Be sure to check out HuffPost Style on Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr and Pinterest.

headline: Princess Victoria Birthday: The Swedish Royal Celebrates In Traditional Outfit (PHOTOS)
short descr: Since no Swedish royal celebration would be complete without a fantastic show of traditional dress, Princess Victoria and
image_caption(s): Princess Victoria, Prince Daniel & Princess Estelle
article: If you couldn't tell by Queen Elizabeth II's Diamond Jubilee, we love a good royal anniversary. So we were pretty excited for the birthday of Princess Victoria yesterday.The beloved Swedish royal kicked off the Victoria Day festivities at Solliden Palace, the summer residence of the Swedish royal family, with newborn daughter Princess Estelle and husband Prince Daniel. The future queen wore a powder blue shift dress and cardigan and navy heels with slicked back hair.Thousands of people were there to cheer on Princess Victoria on her 35th birthday, so the rest of the family dressed to impress. Princess Madeleine (a known Victoria Beckham-enthusiast!) opted for a white pleated skirt with blue polka dots and a sleek navy down jacket. The younger princess styled her hair in lose curls à la Kate Middleton.Since no Swedish royal celebration would be complete without a fantastic show of traditional dress, Princess Victoria and her mother Queen Silvia ended the evening wearing national garb for the annual concert and awarding of the Crown Princess Victoria scholarships at Borgholm Sports Field. All in all, it seems like Princess Victoria had quite an eventful birthday celebration. Click through to see photos and tell us what you think of the Swedish royals' outfit choices.Want more? Be sure to check out HuffPost Style on Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr and Pinterest.

headline: iPhone 5 Photos, iPad Mini Leaks, And New Retina MacBook Pros: This Week In Apple Rumors
short descr: Hello, ladies and gentlemen, and welcome to This Week In Apple Rumors, our regular look back at all of the week's unconfirmed
image_caption(s): Alleged iPhone 5 Photos, Complete With Glass Cover In Place, Leak
article: Hello, ladies and gentlemen, and welcome to This Week In Apple Rumors, our regular look back at all of the week's unconfirmed gossip, questionably-sourced reports and blatant speculation about future Apple products from around the web! Let's take a look back at what the various Apple blogs and websites were excited about in the past week, from July 8 - 14. Check out our previous edition of Apple rumors here, and for all the latest you can follow me on Twitter right here.
